author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the olive oil in a pan over a medium heat and cook the beetroot for 2-3 minutes. Add the balsamic vinegar and cumin seeds, turn up the heat and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the vinegar has reduced by half and the beetroot is caramelised and sticky. To serve, place the caramelised beetroot onto a plate.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  2 ready-cooked beetroot, quartered,  2 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  1 tsp cumin seeds
